string.value: They say that if you achieve #e#b150 wins#k#n in the #bMonster Carnival: Season 1#k, you'll receive the #b<Carnival Winner>#k title that even Spiegelmann will recognize!

If you achieve #e#b150 wins#k#n in the #bMonster Carnival: Season 1#k, you'll receive the #b<Carnival Winner>#k title that even Spiegelmann will recognize. \r\nParticipate in the Monster Carnival now!\r\n#r #jvic# #k wins / 150 wins
You achieved #e#b150 wins#k#n in the #bMonster Carnival: Season 1#k and received the #b<Carnival Winner>#k title that even Spiegelmann recognizes.

Hello! Welcome to the fantastic Monster Carnival! Have you been taking full advantage of the carnival? You won't fully enjoy this experience by simply participating. Why don't you challenge yourself by achieving a great title?
The goal of the Monster Carnival is winning. If you achieve #e#b150 Wins#k#n, you'll be given the honorable #b<Carnival Winner>#k title. Be sure to challenge yourself today!
Well, having fun is important, but what about gaining honor and recognition?
The goal of the Monster Carnival is winning. If you achieve #e#b150 Wins#k#n, you'll be given the honorable #b<Carnival Winner>#k title. Be sure to challenge yourself today!
